body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       To learn more about all the sites in the National Parks of New York Harbor, visit our newsroom.         There's a new way to keep up with all the happenings at St. Paul's Church National Historic Site. We're now on Twitter. Become a follower and receive updates on programming as well as interesting facts.      October 1, 2015- Local schools renamed after former parishioners of St. Paul's Church.
title: Saint Paul's Church National Historic Site: News
